name: Pew Pew Cube
description:
Play right in the browser or download it!

Catch colored blocks spawned by walls with your cube by rotating it so the same colored side collects the block. Keep up with the blocks using quick thinking and reflexes as the blocks spawn faster and faster. Earn points and score multipliers for long matchstreaks. But lose a life if you catch a block with the wrong side.

This was a small personal project for myself to work on over the summer to experiment with simple controls and addicting gameplay.

--Instructions--

WASD - Rotate on X and Y axis

Q and E - Rotate on the Z axis

**You can practice using the controls in the main menu before starting the game.
